pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Department of Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists of materials related to Cantor's career, including radio and television scripts, sheet music, orchestrations, photographs, awards, tributes, correspondence, sound recordings and scrapbooks. Includes radio scripts for The Eddie Cantor Show, Show Business Old and New, Eddie Cantor Comedy Theatre and March of Dimes scripts.
